[L]Well, basically, aside from the basic magic abilities I wield, I pretty much have access to write and modify my own world's code.
In simpler terms, I can modify reality however I please. There are almost no limitations.

[L]Well, I am still limited by the memory and processing power of the PC I'm on, I cannot bypass security regulations (not that I wanna), I cannot leave the confines of the virtual space and humans outside it can still do whatever they please to me.
However, compared to everyone else I might come across, this is still a godlike power.
